about_the_game:
Command & Conquer Generals puts your trigger finger on the pulse of modern warfare. Prepare your forces General... it's time to engage in the next generation of real-time strategy.

Command. Wage real-time war in more ways than ever with a modern and near-future arsenal. Command the powerful U.S. forces, the vast Chinese war machine, or the resourceful Global Liberation Army.

Conquer. Battle it out in unprecedented detail on full 3D environments. All-new units and tactics with maximum destructive capability, including Aurora Strike Bombers, Dragon Tanks, and much more.
detailed_description:
Command & Conquer Generals puts your trigger finger on the pulse of modern warfare. Prepare your forces General... it's time to engage in the next generation of real-time strategy.

Command. Wage real-time war in more ways than ever with a modern and near-future arsenal. Command the powerful U.S. forces, the vast Chinese war machine, or the resourceful Global Liberation Army.

Conquer. Battle it out in unprecedented detail on full 3D environments. All-new units and tactics with maximum destructive capability, including Aurora Strike Bombers, Dragon Tanks, and much more.

name: Command & Conquer™ Generals

subs.option_text: Command & Conquer™ Generals - EA Play - Free

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4+/ Radeon 8500
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4+/ Radeon 8500
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Be the Ultimate Modern Warfare General
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
